sentence: Among non-genetic causes, teratogen exposure like warfarin and acenocoumarol is well known but for the past few years cases have been reported with maternal autoimmune disease mainly systemic lupus erythematosus and rarely with mixed connective tissue disorder (MCTD).

Among non-genetic causes, teratogen exposure like warfarin and acenocoumarol is well known but for the past few years cases have been reported with maternal autoimmune disease mainly systemic lupus erythematosus and rarely with mixed connective tissue disorder (MCTD).
Further research work is needed to explore the association of specific antibody titre with the occurrence of such condition in maternal autoimmune disease.
